Articles.Content:
This is my standard mun lander, (Sandbox, as I am awful at career) based on this (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Luna_16) Soviet Lander

(The image might be a little low-quality due to my use of Texture reduction)

As you can see, the Return stage separates and can attain orbit, although not fully return.

The lander stage can stay on the mun and "Transmit Data"

Mods used: Mechjeb, mostly for altitude data.

Near future Propulsion, The xenon tanks are empty, they're just for looks, and I actually don't have the rest of the mod installed.

Near future Construction, Parts on the rocket have this.

If anyone wants a download link I can post one.
